alert.note: Alert for Osage; Rogers; Tulsa (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 5:52AM CDT until July 21 at 6:45AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Rogers County in northeastern Oklahoma... Southeastern Osage County in northeastern Oklahoma... Northeastern Tulsa County in northeastern Oklahoma... * Until 645 AM CDT. * At 552 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles northeast of Walnut Creek State Park, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations in or near the path include... Tulsa... Claremore... Owasso... Skiatook... Catoosa... Collinsville... Verdigris... Sperry... Oologah... Turley... Tulsa International Airport... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 238 and 247. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
